about_the_game:
"Dive into a magical journey where you get to decide which character to use to build your own magical prowess. An action-packed adventure awaits in this one-of-a-kind shooter game! Choose from various characters and spells to master their powers and earn a living. Will it be 3-Way, Spread, or Rapid Fire? Nurture your magic, sell it, and profit from your journey that starts now.

In this roguelike game, experiment with a variety of magic and character combinations. Defeat enemies to collect orbs and enhance your magical abilities. With each playthrough lasting around 5 minutes, you can effortlessly try out different strategies.

So, step into a world where magic meets the modern era, and use your magical skills to become incredibly wealthy! A new adventure may just be beginning. Let's enjoy this magical adventure...!"

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G1620
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Intel HD 3000 or equivalent
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-4770 CPU @ 3.40GHz 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: "Embark on a journey to master your magical build! Will you choose 3-Way, Spread, or Rapid Fire? This is a one-man army shooter! Cultivate your magic, sell it off, and rake in the profits! You can choose your character and the magic you want to grow. Get rich in the blink of an eye!"
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
